item.title: Project III: Generating Keywords for Google Ads
item.description: Data Science Project Nov 2022 Lagos Nigeria Imagine working for a digital marketing agency, and the agency is approached by a massive online retailer of furniture. They want to test our skills at creating large campaigns for all of their website. We are tasked with creating a prototype set of keywords for search campaigns for their sofas section. The client says that they want us to generate keywords for the following products:sofas, convertible_sofas, love_seats, recliners, sofa_beds.
